title: Provided that Government land or land belonging to tribal can be considered for the purpose of road if there is a registered Agreement
clause_text: Provided that Government land or land belonging to tribal can be considered for the purpose of road if there is a registered Agreement. However development permission shall be granted only after due permission of appropriate authority is given. Notified forest, (excluding the private forest land subject to NOCs of forest Department)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
